mapper.select: SELECT R.room_idx, R.room_name, R.room_notice, R.room_img_url, R.room_price, R.max_people_cnt, R.max_pet_cnt, R.avg_rating, R.number_of_review, L.lod_name, L.lod_address, L.lod_check_in, L.lod_check_out FROM ROOM R INNER JOIN LODGMENT L ON R.lod_idx = L.lod_idx WHERE R.room_idx = #{room_idx};
